prismaticEvents:NeowsFallenEvent.NAME: Neows Fallen
DESCRIPTIONS: As you start your journey through ~The~ ~Spire~ you see the gear of fallen adventurers arranged into a makeshift memorial.
You grab one of the loose peices of equipment and continue on your way. Somewhere in your journey you seem to have lost some of your starting gear.
You rummage through the memorial and grab a piece of equipment. Somewhere in your journey you seem to have lost some of your starting gear.
You decide that it is best not to disturb the dead. You hope that you can avoid a similar fate to those those who came before you.
